meanings.definition: A rare inherited disorder that causes a buildup of phenylalanine in the body.
meanings.sent1: Phenylketonurias can lead to serious health problems if not managed properly.
meanings.sent2: Doctors are studying different treatments for phenylketonurias.
meanings.sent3: Why did the phenylketonurias go to school? To learn how to stay healthy!
meanings.sent4: Her love for sweets was like a phenylketonurias, slowly building up and causing harm.
meanings.sent5: The impact of phenylketonurias on the body is like a silent intruder, slowly causing chaos.
